content: FYI. The minutes and call recordings for both the IPS HL7 (technical) and Cross-SDO Collaboration calls today have been posted to the Confluence site.
The minutes and recordings of our IPS HL7 call yesterday are posted to Confluence here.

It took me a little longer than I wanted (doing it for both meetings), but I've posted the minutes and call recordings for our Wednesday (11/03) calls on Confluence:
HL7 IPS call here
IPS Cross-SDO call here
Please review and make any additions/corrections (or let me know and I will do that).
